text: The Cerro Colorado Formation is a geological formation to the south of General Carrera Lake in Patagonia. Sedimentary rocks of the Cerro Colorado Formation deposited under shallow marine conditions. == See also == * * == References == Category:Geologic formations of Chile Category:Lower Cretaceous Series of South America Category:Cretaceous Chile Category:Shallow marine deposits Formations Category:Geology of Aysén Region
title: Cerro Colorado Formation
